lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Turkey, Thailand, South Korea and Canada were the major buyers for the current season, while Thailand, Britain and Japan were the major purchasers from the upcoming season, the department said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Cotton sales of 57,900 running bales -- 43,800 bales for the current year and 14,200 bales for the 1987/88 season -- were off 25 pct from the previous week and 50 pct from the four-week average.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The department said the USSR dominated the week's activity with purchases of 1.4 mln tonnes (which were earlier reported under the daily reporting system).

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Turkey, Thailand, South Korea and Canada were the major buyers for the current season, while Thailand, Britain and Japan were the major purchasers from the upcoming season, the department said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Cotton sales of 57,900 running bales -- 43,800 bales for the current year and 14,200 bales for the 1987/88 season -- were off 25 pct from the previous week and 50 pct from the four-week average.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The department said the USSR dominated the week's activity with purchases of 1.4 mln tonnes (which were earlier reported under the daily reporting system).
